tasks.label: Git: Archive Branch with Dynamic Name (tar.gz)
tasks.detail: 将当前分支打包为 {项目名}-{分支名}-{日期}.tar.gz

windows.command: git archive --format=tar HEAD | gzip > "${workspaceFolderBasename}-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)-$(Get-Date -Format 'yyMMdd').tar.gz"

linux.command: git archive --format=tar HEAD | gzip > "${workspaceFolderBasename}-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)-$(date +%y%m%d).tar.gz"
